00027 #ifndef NETWORK_PACKET_CONNECTION_RESPONSE_H
00028 #define NETWORK_PACKET_CONNECTION_RESPONSE_H
00029 
00030 #include "netpacketbase.h"
00031 
00032 namespace RainbruRPG{
00033   namespace Network{
00034 
00040     typedef enum tServerConnectionResponse{
00041       NCR_UNDEFINED    =0x01, //<! The response is undefined
00042       NCR_ACCEPTED     =0x02, //<! The connection is accepted
00043       NCR_REFUSED      =0x03, //<! The connection is refused
00044 
00045     };
00046 
00050     typedef union npConnectionResponseData{
00052       struct {
00060         guint16 packetIdentifier;
00066         guint16 response; 
00067       };
00069       enet_uint8 data[4];
00070     };
00071 
00078     class npConnectionResponse : public NetPacketBase{
00079     public:
00080       npConnectionResponse();
00081       npConnectionResponse(tServerConnectionResponse);
00082 
00083       ~npConnectionResponse();
00084 
00085       void setResponse(tServerConnectionResponse);
00086       tServerConnectionResponse getResponse();
00087 
00088       virtual void netSerialize();
00089       virtual void netDeserialize();
00090       virtual enet_uint8* getData();
00091       virtual size_t getDataLength();
00092       virtual void setData(enet_uint8*, size_t);
00093 
00094       bool responseToBool(tServerConnectionResponse);
00095 
00096     private:
00098       npConnectionResponseData* data;
00100       tServerConnectionResponse response;
00101     };
00102   }
00103 }
00104 #endif // NETWORK_PACKET_CONNECTION_RESPONSE_H
